sense.def:
Besedo
both
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o dveh osebah ali predmetih in nekaj povemo o njiju.

seg.quote: He got angry with both of them.
Most of them speak either English or German or both.

sense.def:
Strukturo
both...and
uporabimo, kadar navedemo dve dejstvi ali možnosti in poudarimo, da sta obe resnični ali izvedljivi.

seg.quote: These are dangers that threaten both men and women.
The prospects both excited and worried me.
